document_data.name: Rhindaun Dynasty
document_data.mainbody: '''Rhindaun Dynasty''' was one of the ruling dynasties of [[Tethyr]], founded by the adventuress [[Zaranda Star|Zaranda Star Rhindaun]].
document_data.Etymology: The dynasty took its name from King-Consort [[Haedrak Rhindaun III|Haedrak's]] mother, [[Rhinda]], second wife of [[Alemander V]].
document_data.History:
The dynasty was officially founded in [[1368 DR]]. After Zaranda Star won the [[Reclamation Wars]] and married the lost prince of Tethyr, Haedrak Rhindaun III, her official coronation was in [[1369 DR]].

The full line of succession for the dynasty is unknown, but Queen Zaranda's first daughter [[Sybille Rhindaun|Sybille]] succeeded her as the second queen of the line.{{Cite dragon/365/Backdrop: Cormyr|44}} Later rulers in the Rhindaun dynasty were Queen [[Cyriana (queen)|Cyriana]] and King [[Errilam (king)|Errilam]], and Queen [[Anais Rhindaun|Anais]], who ruled as early as [[1468 DR]] and at least as late as [[1489 DR]]. Sybille's niece Princess [[Jemra Rhindaun]] married into the [[Obarskyr]] dynasty of [[Cormyr]] in [[1430 DR]].{{Cite dungeon/198/Cormyr Royale: The Royal Court of the Forest Kingdom|62}}
